name: Savya and the Maze of Orbs (Pre-Alpha)
name_original: Savya and the Maze of Orbs (Pre-Alpha)
description:
Control Savya and Alizea together to collect orbs, disable drones, and get out of the maze alive.

Savya Controls:
WAD to move
E or S to interact

Alizea Controls:
UP LEFT or RIGHT to move 
DOWN to interact

UI Controls:
SPACE to go full screen
Q to pause Savya (and open some placeholder art)
UP and DOWN to scroll through menus
M to mute and change songs

(This game is in pre-alpha, the next update will include all bug-free features. Any and all feedback is appreciated. Comment here, or reach me on Twitter @tkabrams1)
